TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IPermission implements class System.Security.ISecurityEncodable

summary.span: 定義由使用權限類型實作的方法。

span.span: Defines methods implemented by permission types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Common language runtime 中的權限是物件，描述可以保護指定資源的作業集。Permissions in the common language runtime are objects that describe sets of operations that can be secured for specified resources. 權限物件描述操作或安全性控制項，受限於的存取它不代表存取或執行作業的權限。A permission object describes operations or access that is subject to security control; it does not represent access or a right to perform operations. 應用程式程式碼和.NET Framework 安全性系統會使用的權限以下列方式。Permissions are used by both application code and the .NET Framework security system in the following ways. - 程式碼要求它才能執行需要的權限。Code requests the permissions it needs in order to run. - 安全性系統原則授與權限，才能讓它執行的程式碼。The security system policy grants permissions to code in order for it to run. - 程式碼會要求呼叫程式碼的權限。Code demands that calling code has a permission. - 程式碼會覆寫安全性堆疊使用判斷提示/拒絕/只允許的。Code overrides the security stack using assert/deny/permit-only. > [!NOTE] > 如果您撰寫新的權限，您必須在類別中實作這個介面。If you write a new permission, you must implement this interface in your class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 可以由多個執行緒存取權限。A permission can be accessed by multiple threads. 實作這個介面時，您必須保證， ， ，和方法實作都是安全執行緒。When implementing this interface, you must guarantee that the , , , and method implementations are thread safe. ## Examples 這個範例示範如何定義程式碼存取安全性權限類別使用。This example shows how to define a permission class for use with code access security. 會實作所有必要的權限的介面。All of the necessary permission interfaces are implemented. [!code-cpp[Permission#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Permission/cpp/Permission.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Permission#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Permission/CS/Permission.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Permission#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Permission/vb/permission.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Copy() cil managed

summary.span: 建立並傳回目前權限的相同複本。

span.span: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission.
A copy of the current permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一份權限表示與原始的權限資源相同的存取權。A copy of a permission represents the same access to resources as the original permission. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作方法。The following code example demonstrates implementing the method. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[Permission#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Permission/cpp/Permission.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[Permission#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Permission/CS/Permission.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Permission#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Permission/vb/permission.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Demand() cil managed

summary.span: 如果不符合安全性要求，在 Run Time 時會擲回 。

span.span: Throws a at run time if the security requirement is not met.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法通常可由安全程式庫來確定呼叫端擁有存取資源的權限。This method is typically used by secure libraries to ensure that callers have permission to access a resource. 例如，檔案中的類別安全類別庫的呼叫必要的之前執行檔案作業的呼叫端要求。For example, a file class in a secure class library calls for the necessary before performing a file operation requested by the caller. 雖然大部分的類別可實作此介面方法會滿足安全性準則執行完整堆疊查核行程，不一定會執行堆疊查核行程。Although the majority of the classes that implement this interface method satisfy the security criteria by performing a full stack walk, a stack walk is not necessarily performed. 舉例來說，不會執行堆疊查核行程的實作是。An example of an implementation that does not perform a stack walk is . 執行堆疊查核行程時，就不會檢查呼叫這個方法的程式碼的權限;檢查該程式碼的立即呼叫端從開始，然後進行堆疊。When a stack walk is performed, the permissions of the code that calls this method are not examined; the check begins from the immediate caller of that code and proceeds up the stack. 呼叫堆疊通常會表示向下成長，使方法呼叫堆疊中較高層呼叫的方法較低的呼叫堆疊中。The call stack is typically represented as growing down, so that methods higher in the call stack call methods lower in the call stack. 只有當沒有成功，就會引發。 succeeds only if no is raised.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Intersect(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Function Intersect (target As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 要與目前權限產生交集的權限。

span.span: A permission to intersect with the current permission.

param.span: 必須與目前權限屬於相同的類型。

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 建立並傳回目前權限與指定權限交集的權限。

span.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 代表目前權限與指定權限交集的新權限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果交集是空的，這個新使用權限為 。

span.span: This new permission is if the intersection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 兩個權限的交集會描述一組共同兩者描述的作業的權限。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the set of operations they both describe in common. 只有通過這兩個原始的使用權限的需求會通過交集。Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection. 下列陳述式必須為 true 的所有實作方法。The following statements are required to be true for all implementations of the method. `X` 和`Y`代表物件參考未`null`。`X` and `Y` represent object references that are not `null`. - `X`.Intersect (`X`) 傳回的值等於`X`。`X`.Intersect(`X`) returns a value equal to `X`. - `X`.Intersect (`Y`) 傳回相同的值做為`Y`。Intersect (`X`)。`X`.Intersect(`Y`) returns the same value as `Y`.Intersect(`X`). - `X`.Intersect (`null`) 傳回`null`。`X`.Intersect(`null`) returns `null`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作方法。The following code example demonstrates implementing the method. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[Permission#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Permission/cpp/Permission.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Permission#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Permission/CS/Permission.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Permission#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Permission/vb/permission.vb#2)]

exception.span: 參數不是 ，並且不是與目前使用權限相同類別的執行個體。

span.span: The parameter is not and is not an instance of the same class as the current permission.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsSubsetOf(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Function IsSubsetOf (target As IPermission) As Boolean

param.name: target
param.span: 要測試子集關聯性的權限。

span.span: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.

param.span: 這個權限必須與目前權限屬於相同的類型。

span.span: This permission must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 判斷目前權限是否為指定權限的子集。

span.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果目前的使用權限是指定之使用權限的子集，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目前權限會指定一組完全包含所指定的權限的作業，目前的權限會是所指定權限的子集。The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained by the specified permission. 例如，表示 C:\example.txt 的存取權限是到 c： 代表存取權限的子集\\。For example, a permission that represents access to C:\example.txt is a subset of a permission that represents access to C:\\. 如果此方法傳回`true`，目前的權限，表示沒有存取受保護的資源比指定的權限。If this method returns `true`, the current permission represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission. 下列陳述式必須為 true 的所有實作方法。The following statements are required to be true for all implementations of the method. `X``Y`，和`Z`代表不是物件`null`。`X`, `Y`, and `Z` represent objects that are not `null`. - `X`.IsSubsetOf (`X`) 傳回`true`。`X`.IsSubsetOf(`X`) returns `true`. - `X`.IsSubsetOf (`Y`) 傳回相同的值做為`Y`。IsSubsetOf (`X`) 如果且只有`X`和`Y`代表相同的權限集。`X`.IsSubsetOf(`Y`) returns the same value as `Y`.IsSubsetOf(`X`) if and only if `X` and `Y` represent the same set of permissions. - 如果`X`。IsSubsetOf (`Y`) 和`Y`。IsSubsetOf (`Z`) 都會傳回`true`， `X`。IsSubsetOf (`Z`) 傳回`true`。If `X`.IsSubsetOf(`Y`) and `Y`.IsSubsetOf(`Z`) both return `true`, `X`.IsSubsetOf(`Z`) returns `true`. 如果`X`表示空具有權限狀態的物件和`Y`代表物件`null`， `X`。IsSubsetOf (`Y`) 傳回`true`。If `X` represents an empty object with a permission state of and `Y` represents an object that is `null`, `X`.IsSubsetOf(`Y`) returns `true`. 如果`Z`也是空白的使用權限的複合設定作業`X`。Union(Z)。IsSubsetOf(Y) 也會傳回`true`因為兩個空的權限的聯集是空的權限。If `Z` is also an empty permission, the compound set operation `X`.Union(Z).IsSubsetOf(Y) also returns `true` because the union of two empty permissions is an empty permission. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作方法。The following code example demonstrates implementing the method. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[Permission#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Permission/cpp/Permission.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[Permission#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Permission/CS/Permission.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Permission#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Permission/vb/permission.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Union(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Function Union (target As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 要與目前權限結合的權限，

span.span: A permission to combine with the current permission.

param.span: 必須與目前權限屬於相同的類型。

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 建立目前權限與指定權限聯集的權限。

span.span: Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 代表目前權限與指定權限聯集的新權限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要呼叫的結果是權限，表示代表的所有作業目前的權限和指定的權限。The result of a call to is a permission that represents all the operations represented by both the current permission and the specified permission. 傳遞其中一個權限的任何要求會傳遞它們的聯集。Any demand that passes either permission passes their union. 下列陳述式必須為 true 的所有實作方法。The following statements are required to be true for all implementations of the method. `X` 和`Y`代表不是物件`null`。`X` and `Y` represent objects that are not `null`. - `X`.等位 (`X`) 傳回的物件具有相同的值`X`。`X`.Union(`X`) returns an object that has the same value as `X`. - `X`.等位 (`Y`) 傳回的物件具有相同的值所傳回的物件`Y`。等位 (`X`)。`X`.Union(`Y`) returns an object that has the same value as the object returned by `Y`.Union(`X`). - `X`.等位 (`null`) 傳回的物件具有相同的值`X`。`X`.Union(`null`) returns an object that has the same value as `X`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作方法。The following code example demonstrates implementing the method. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[Permission#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Permission/cpp/Permission.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[Permission#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Permission/CS/Permission.cs#5)] [!code-vb[Permission#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Permission/vb/permission.vb#5)] -
